issue.title: multisense_state_publisher and robot_state_publisher publish conflicting TF for MS lidar

content.raw:
Should you still be the owner on that? 
![Screenshot from 2017-06-05 22:03:25.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/1365201384-Screenshot_from_2017-06-05_220325.png)

I installed it anyway and noticed that it had removed joint_state_publisher...  After reinstalling that, it looks like it works.  No more fighting TF transforms for the MS. Thanks for the quick fix.  What does the timeline for rolling it out look like?
content.html:
Should you still be the owner on that?
